name: 許祖嘉
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
Week 1: Orientation and course introduction
Week 2: Listening and Reading
Week 3: Listening and Reading
Week 4: Listening and Speaking
Week 5: Listening and Speaking
Week 6: Reading and Speaking
Week 7: Reading, Speaking, and Listening
Week 8: Reading, Speaking, and Listening
Week 9: Mid-term Exam
Week 10: Writing and Reading
Week 11: Writing, speaking and reading
Week 12: Writing, speaking and reading
Week 13: Writing, speaking and reading
Week 14: Vocabulary. reading and listening
Week 15: Vocabulary, reading and listeing
Week 16: Vocabulary, reading, speaking and listeing
Week 17: Review
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. class attendence and mini tests 40%
2. mid-term exam             30%
3. final exam                30%
